channel.title: Projects on Sohaib
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Sohaib

item.title: CHIP-8 Emulator
item.description: This project is a CHIP-8 emulator written in Golang. The Ebiten game engine was used to create the graphical interface. Developing this project helped me understand how emulators work by simulating the behavior of a physical machine in software.

item.title: Yet Another C Compiler
item.description: This repository contains my implementation of a C Compiler, developed as part of a lab project during my undergraduate studies at BUET. The project encompasses the complete pipeline of compiler construction, progressing through various stages to produce a functional compiler.

item.title: xv6 Operating System Enhancements
item.description: This project extends the xv6 Operating System, a simple Unix-like OS developed for educational purposes. The enhancements include the implementation of advanced scheduling algorithms, paging, and file system features. The project was initially developed as part of an operating systems lab, showcasing practical skills in OS development.
